title: Topography aware weather forecasting in europe
authors: (supervisor)  Chang Xu, (head supervisor) Prof. Devis Tuia
description: Developped GINR and EECR Frameworks for integrating topography into forcasting models.

title: Neuronal cell morphology classification
authors: (supervisor)  Lida Kanari, (head supervisor) Prof. Jerôme Scherrer
description: Combined Algebraic Topology and Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) in multi-embedding fusion models for classifying neuronal morphologies.

title: Graph based Epilepsy Seizure Detection form EEG-Signal
description: Explored Graph Machine Learning for seizure detection, experimenting with signal representations, graph construction, and model architectures.

title: Hurricane Damage Detection from Satelite Imagery
description: Finetuned vision foundation model heads (ResNext,ViT, DinoV3), applied posthoc calibration methods. Predicting infrastructure damage, along with a certainty measure.

title: Geothermal Heat Pump Simulation
description: Developed a simulator for geothermal heat pump cycles to analyze component and setup dependencies. Simulates fluid flow and heat conduction through generic pipe geometries and transport media.

title: Aerial Road Segmentation
description: Evaluated the performance of various convolutional neural network (CNN) based architectures for road segmentation from aerial imagery.

title: ODE-Solver Software
description: Developed a flexible and extensible C++ solver for ordinary differential equations (ODEs), supporting implicit and explicit methods including Runge-Kutta, Adams-Bashforth, and Euler.

title: Feature Engineering on BRFSS survey data for Heart Attack prediction
description: Predicted heart attacks from survey data using feature engineering and logistic regression models.
